name: React
description: React is a JavaScript library developed by Meta for building interactive, component-based user interfaces efficiently.

name: HTML 5
description: HTML5 is the standard language for structuring web content. It introduces semantic tags, video, audio, and better accessibility.

name: CSS 3
description: CSS3 styles web pages with animations, transitions, and advanced layouts like Flexbox and Grid.

name: Javascript
description: JavaScript is a programming language that makes web pages interactive: animations, dynamic forms, and live updates.

name: Node.js
description: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript runtime based on V8, ideal for fast, scalable web applications.

name: Express.js
description: Express.js is a minimalist Node.js framework designed to build APIs and web apps quickly.

name: Ruby on Rails
description: Ruby on Rails is a Ruby-based web framework emphasizing convention over configuration for rapid development.

name: NestJs
description: NestJS is a structured Node.js framework inspired by Angular, used to build robust TypeScript APIs.

name: Git
description: Git is a distributed version control system that tracks and manages changes in source code.

name: GitHub
description: GitHub is a Git-based collaborative platform for hosting, sharing, and versioning code online.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: VS Code is a lightweight, extensible, cross-platform code editor ideal for web development and supporting many languages.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing for better readability, maintainability, and compile-time error checking.

name: PostGreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, reliable, open-source relational database system that follows SQL standards.

name: MySQL
description: MySQL is a widely used relational database management system, suitable for both simple and complex web applications.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a document-oriented NoSQL database, flexible and ideal for unstructured data and scalable apps.

name: Next.js
description: Next.js is a React framework for full-stack web development, supporting server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG).

name: MacOS
description: MacOS is Apple’s operating system for its computers, known for stability, security, and a clean interface.

name: Windows
description: Windows is Microsoft’s operating system, widely used in personal, professional, and educational environments.

name: Sass
description: Sass is a CSS preprocessor that enables variables, loops, and functions for more maintainable styling code.

name: Postman
description: Postman is an API testing tool that simplifies HTTP requests, documentation, and automated tests.

name: Pro Tools
description: Pro Tools is a professional audio production software used in studios for recording, editing, and advanced mixing.
